wikipedia_page.main: Paul Robinson (born 5 January 1963) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League as a left back. His career was cut short after sustaining a broken leg in a pre-season match in a tackle by Colchester's Roger Osbourne, scorer of the FA Cup final winning goal for Ipswich in 1978.
